issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `disApproveUsers(address[])`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `approveUsers(address[])`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow
